entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon with flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls late this afternoon. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
